text:
Meshify | Backend Engineer and Frontend Lead | Austin, TX | Full-time | On-site (relocation possible)

Meshify is an IoT data capture, analytics, and analysis company headquartered in Austin, TX. The company is a wholly owned subsidiary of HSB Group in Hartford, CT, part of Munich Re, one of the worldâ€™s largest reinsurers. We make heavy use of Go, PostgreSQL, Cassandra (Scylla), and NSQ. The frontend is JavaScript and React-ish.

Backend Engineer: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/meshifycom/view/P_AA...

Frontend Lead: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/meshifycom/view/P_AA...
